questions.question: What versions of the Open Charge Point Protocol (OCPP) exist?
What are the latest advancements in bidirectional charging standards?
questions.expected_answer: Recent advancements include the implementation of ISO 15118-20 for bidirectional energy flow.

questions.question: What OCPP standards are implemented in the Everest project as of January 2025?
What is the CitroneOS Project?
questions.expected_answer: Open source charger network software for rapid OCPP 2.0.1 and NEVI compliant EV charge management.

questions.question: According to OCPP definitions, what belongs to what? The EVSE to the charging station or the charging station to the EVSE?
questions.expected_answer: The EVSE is part of a charging station.
